name: Beat Guru
description:
Easy to pick up but difficult to master, Beat Guru is made for rhythm game newcomers and seasoned maestros alike.

Based on the foundational text 'Feel the Beat', Beat Guru brings author Dr. Gil Noblin’s seminal text to the modern age. First published in 1979, Noblin’s doctrine on how each of us can connect to the rhythm of the universe is faithfully adapted in this new application. Players will be taken through each of Noblin’s lessons, accompanied with interactive audio-visual sequences. Beat Guru provides the opportunity to learn Noblin’s philosophy in ways never seen before.

  • Intuitive one-button gameplay.
  • A groovy, foot-tapping soundtrack.
  • Bold visual aesthetic.
  • Self-help insight that will improve your relationship with the world around you.
